title: Juvenile critically injured after shooting near Richmond park
content:
RICHMOND, VA (WWBT) -
Richmond Police are looking a suspect who opened fire in the Northside Thursday, critically injuring a juvenile near a public park.
The incident happened around 5:40 p.m. in the 2800 block of Dunn Avenue. The crime scene is a block away from Hotchkiss Park.
Medics brought the male victim to the VCU Medical Center trauma center, and detectives did not have an immediate suspect description.
